config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'roundingHandler' configuration is loaded from the preference store and its value is used to set the choiceRounding in the UI. It is part of a larger method that loads various preferences and sets UI elements accordingly.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The 'roundingHandler' configuration is triggered whenever the loadPrefs method is called, which typically happens when the application starts or when the user accesses the settings/preferences section.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'roundingHandler' configuration option is mainly on the UI, as it determines the default selection in the choiceRounding dropdown. It does not have a direct impact on the system functionality or performance.
